article.title: May 2013 Galaxy Update
article.content:
The May 2013 Galaxy Update is now available.

Highlights:

  • the GCC2013 early registration deadline is 24 May.
  • 39 new papers
  • Open Positions at five different institutions
  • Other Upcoming Events
  • Galaxy Distributions
  • Tool Shed Contributions
  • Other News

If you have anything you would like to see in the June Galaxy Update, please let us know.

Dave Clements and the Galaxy Team
